attributes.action: Stop companies hiking up the price of holidays in school holidays
attributes.additional_details: The reason families take their children out of school during term time is because they cant afford to go on holiday during the school holidays because the prices more than double
attributes.background: If you want to bring in the rules of more fines and court proceedings for taking children out of school, there needs to be a change in holiday companies prices during the school holidays

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

Allow students to be taken out of school for two weeks a year without penalty
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/658365
